term.name: Export-Import Bank of the United States

bill.summary:
9/9/2014--Introduced. Made-in-America Bank Act - Amends the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to redesignate the Export-Import Bank as the Made-in-America Bank.
Declares that all guarantees, loans, insurance, and any other benefits historically provided by the Export-Import Bank may only be made to a domestic entity that is not majority-owned by any foreign person or entity, and only for the purpose of acquiring goods or services made in America.
Extends the termination date of the Export-Import Bank from 2014 to 2016.
